TopicTitle: Star Wars spacesuit textures for texture replacer

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

Star Wars day is almost upon us and texture replacer has already been updated to work with 1.0, so I thought a great way to celebrate would be with Star Wars themed spacesuits for our kerbals.

Given the awesomeness of the modding community and the popularity of Star Wars, there may very well be a mod that does this already, if so I would appreciate being pointed in that direction.

Otherwise, I'm absolutely terrible with textures so I wouldn't have time to figure it out before the 4th, but I was hoping that someone with the knowledge and tools would be willing to create some awesome spacesuit textures.

I was thinking having at least a stormtrooper, imperial pilot, rebel pilot and rebel trooper textures.

Thanks in advance!
